content: **designed to give to each person as a party favor at an upcoming eclipse party this coaster is a crocheted worsted weight rendition of a partial solar eclipse ** skill level beginner + knowledge of simple stitch patterns and shaping piece measures 5 at widest point coaster part the moon accommodates large cups up to 4 and can be made larger with a larger hook colors used were lily sugar n cream cotton worsted amounts are for 1 coaster * black - 13 yds 12 m * sunshine - 9 yds 8 m * hot orange - 6 yds 5 5 m
